Uses of Interface
ninja.uploads.FileItem

  • Packages that use FileItem 
    Package Description
    ninja  
    ninja.params

    • Uses of FileItem in ninja

      Methods in ninja that return FileItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileItem WrappedContext.getParameterAsFileItem(String key) 
      FileItem Context.getParameterAsFileItem(String name)
      Same like Context.getParameter(String, String), but converts the parameter to File if found.
      Methods in ninja that return types with arguments of type FileItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<FileItem> WrappedContext.getParameterAsFileItems(String name) 
      List<FileItem> Context.getParameterAsFileItems(String name)
      Get the files parameter with the given key from the request.
      Map<String,List<FileItem>> WrappedContext.getParameterFileItems() 
      Map<String,List<FileItem>> Context.getParameterFileItems()
      Get all the file parameters from the request
